page.title: 14Upton Club
page.content: I love discos and I usually go to Upton Club.You have to have membership which costs Â£1.50 for an adult which allows their family in as well. Upton Club is near the library and clinic. They have all different kinds of entertainment like groups, discos and parties. They have a bar in the next room so people can go and have a quiet drink. I love it especially at Christmas when the club puts on a party for children aged 10 to 16 years old.We have a meal and disco and I get to know lots of other people in the area. They also put on a pantomine for the younger children. Upton Club is a great community idea.
